CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1957, pg. A23, reads: "OPENING - NIGHT CROWD - Lou and Jules stage the official opening of their Centre Ave. Uptown 88 Bar on Dec. 13, and the crowd shown above responded. in foreground is Lou Catz, one of the owners; rear left is David Howard, bartender, and to the left of Catz stands Harry Bobo, former mainbout boxer, and night manager of the place. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women and men crowded in Lou and Jules Uptown 88 Bar, with bartender Dave Howard on left, and owner Lou Catz on right, with mural of calypso dancers and musicians in background
